Where to Begin

This site contains all of the handouts and information presented in BYU’s Fall 2015 Neuroimaging Analysis course. Go to the SuperComputing Account Request page. I’ve whitelisted the course, so you should be able to get access to the SuperComputer immediately. You will need to have access to the SuperComputer for our first lecture. Happy coding!
